content.detailedDescription:
After reporting what i saw to mufon, i put up a status about the event on my facebook and was tipped off.  what we saw was not a ufo but the international space station which is was and apparently still is viewable from my area last week.  it looks like a star with a light beam. and can be seen for about two to five minutes.  

and we thought we all saw something strange and exciting!
content.summary: Now to ruin the ufo fun for all

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out to my garage this evening when i witnessed three blinking lights in a triangle formation to the northwest of my home. the lights were distant, however they were in the direction of bangor mtn and the borough of stroudsburg (approx 10 miles away). i called my wife outside who witnessed the lights as well. our 16 yr old son joined us as well and attempted to vire the blinking objects with his telescope. in the over 10 years that we have lived in our home, we have never witnessed such an event. the blinking lights would become dull for a few minutes, then they would all begin to blink in tandem. additionally, the triangle formation remained in one location while the stars moved as the earth rotated. after viewing the lights for about an hour, we noticed that two additional blinking light were to both the right and left of the triangle in the distance. all the lights would blink together then become stationary. 

my wife is an assistant principal at a local high school, i am a retired police officer, and now a federal agent with the irs. our son is a honor student. we are not mentally unfit or challenged. both my wife and i possess ms degrees, and my wife is nearly complete with her ph.D.

i am providing our backgrounds because i can't stress enough of what we witnessed. i would be happy to assist with any questions you may have. additionally, there was a news report on the 10pm news of odd lights in the sky over the lehigh valley and berks co, areas of pa. this was seen on wfmz tv chan 69 in allentown, pa. 

thank you!
content.summary: Small triangle formation blinking

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i came home from my birthday dinner as i pulled into the driveway me and my girlfreind saw this bright light shinning down like a big flash light..I do live near dulles airport but it was very clear out. this was no airplane or chopper. as the light went away it left a white have in the sky then dissappere. the light was out of the ordinary it was beaming down for a little bit then diminished slowly.
 ashburn,va 20147
content.summary: Beam of light  floating over ashburn,va

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down the highway and saw what looked like a meteor streak across the sky. it seemed to break of into pieces and fizz out it had an orange color much like fire. i just thought it was a meteor or firework, and shortly thereafter my wife saw another one in the distance. she was driving so i continued to watch the sky. as we approached preston i noticed a flashing white light just off the road over a farmer's field. it wasn't very bright and had almost a box shape and would slowly flash on and off. it looked like it had square compartments which weren't as brightly lit. at first i thought it was just a radio tower or something similar. while staring at it i noticed that it was actually at the center of a huge black triangle. it seemed to be as if it was the size of a football field and dwarfed our van. it seemed to block out the stars and was a little bit darker than the sky. at each point was a light about the same size and brightness of a star and they were flashing. the color of these three lights were also the same of a star, that same white color. i couldn't make out any details on the triangle it just seemed to be a black mass and i couldn't gauge it's thickness or height, because it seemed like we were almost driving under it. it also seemed as if there were stars around it and they seemed to crackle flashing on and off like crazy all around it very quickly at random points. we kept diving because there was no shoulder to really pull over on and the car behind us was close to our bumper. we passed a radio tower and stopped at a gas station close to it. (there are only two gas stations in preston). i hope more people saw what we saw. it was truely awe inspiring. it just hovered no movement or sound.
content.summary: Ufo in preston, missouri.

content.detailedDescription: Had a party for a wedding and a ufo showed up over 20 saw it less than a 100 yards in the back yard tree top level clear sky no clouds no moon but it light up the back yard like day time and created a cloud cover in shrewsbury off of lake street near route 20 and i got a call that it was also seen in lecester,ma also that night 1hr before and it didnt move.
content.summary: Still high power white beam of light tree top level straight to the ground no sound

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting around a campfire on cherry hill rd mahopac, ny i noticed what appeared to be a small blue street light in the southwest sky behind the smoke of the fire.  it projected a blue light in a cone shape as though from a recessed fixture.  as i alerted the others in the group of the object i stood and walked toward the object.  i could at first see the source of the light and the cone of blue brightness that protruded from that source toward us, however it was at a much higher altitude.  the light and cone was visible but never close to the earth and never cast light upon us.  then the source of the light started to rotate away from us to the south and then all we could see was the conical shaped beam and not the source of the light.  another peculiarity to me was the shape of the cone of light.  the night was so clear that i was surprised that we would see a cone of light if it was a spotlight and what perplexed me more was that it ended with definition instead of gradually fading out.  it came from its source, protruded out a certain distance, then stopped and did not radiate further.  

we watched this for about a total of 45 seconds, 10 to 15 seconds seeing the source and cone and 30 to 35 seconds just seeing the conical shaped beam which eventually faded to black.  the sky was completely clear and you could see the milky way.  jupiter was very bright to the southeast of the end of the milky way and 15 to 20 degrees to the left of the object we witnessed.  the event was witnessed by myself, two attorneys, a court reporter, a plumbing contractor, and a general contractor as well.  i am a state trooper with over nineteen years experience and have seen many aerial spotlights.  this was not that.  we also live in a very active flyway for all new york city airports as well as the westchester county airport.  this was no plane either.  when the object's light rotated there was nothing but the blackness of the sky.  no strobes or beacons of any sort.  when the light faded to black there was nothing there at all.  i watched against the stars behind where the object was last seen to possibly see it block some of the stars as it traversed but nothing was witnessed, it just disappeared.
content.summary: Bright blue light cone shaped protruding

content.detailedDescription:
This light my wife and i both saw was incredible ! this was not man made no way the way this thing had a beam of light underneath it too! i wonder if i watched an abduction from afar because this inverted beam of white light underneath the teardrop looking super bright light was wide then it closed/narrowed and as it did the aura around it all got wiredly brighter... this "hover" at about 1000 feet underneath and left of the the orion constellation (the first obvious grouping i could locate) the haze around it began to glow... it was a stark obvious difference than all the rest of the clear sky.. i was freaking out! i was asking my wife is she seeing it... i freaked out so much i didnt think to grab my camera and ill hate myself forever for that. but i plan to recreate what i saw ... when the narrowing inverted v "closed" the light rose a bit ( i have no idea what a bit is lol) just subtlely and then voom vanished !
the haze that was glowing began to decipate and fell closer to us and dissolved decending upon us about 300 feet toward us as it lost its "glow" ...

it was unnatural i thought...
beautiful fraky wild but beautiful!

no noise and there was no aircraft in the entire clear sky !
content.summary: Teardrop light hovers gets brighter rises and vanishes

content.detailedDescription: I was talking with my neighbor in his driveway about 7:45pm and his pet goose was really honking like crazy which is unusual for him at almost 8pm. we gave him some food to shut him up (which it didn't) when i saw the light in the sky. we both witnessed it very clearly. it looked like a spotlight shining down through the clouds but it was a crisp clear sky. the light was bright and cone shaped with the wide part facing down and what appeared to be fog in the light, like a high-beam headlight. no object was seen just the white light, no blinking colors and no sound. then it just disappeared after about a minute, maybe less. the goose relaxed when the light went out. the goats and other animals didn't seem to notice it.
content.summary: Cone shaped bright foggy light in se sky, goose was affected

content.detailedDescription: About 7:45 pm on saturday 9/20/2009 my wife and i noticed a cone shaped light in the southern sky 5 miles north of philadelphia looking south.  we were at a church event and stepped outside for some fresh air.  it started out as a small light that wasn't moving - almost like a star, though much lower than the night sky.  very quickly the light grew into a large cone shaped light hovering in the sky.  there was no sound at all.  the object was much higher than a helicopter would be with it's spot light on.  i could see airplane lights in the far distance to the east and those lights were much higher in altitude than this light.  the cone light zigzagged left and right a few times then slowly diminished to nothing.  there was no noticable movement from a starting point to an end point.  the light completely faded and gave the sense of being blocked out by clouds but it was an absolutely clear night with no clouds at all for miles.  again there was no noise whatsoever related to the light.  it was unnatural and like no other aircraft we had ever seen.  this sighting seems to match very closely with the sight mentioned in mufon case # 19335.
content.summary: Cone light pointing towards ground in the south sky looking towards philadelphia

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:00 pm, my family and i were at our friend's house celebrating 3 birthdays and were standing on the back porch (uncovered) of their house while the children were playing in the yard.  six of us were chatting and i happened to look up and noticed a really big light hovering in the sky directly above the trees across the street.  i asked (shouted) everyone what is that?  

it was a bright beam of light lasting about 10 seconds or so and had a light mist after it disappeared where the bright light was.  whatever it was had to have disappeared instantly going directly up.  my husband mentioned a cone shaped beam of light.  it basically looked like a giant floodlight.  one of the ladies with us thought it was a helicopter at first and realized the light was much bigger and there was no noise whatsoever.  we would have heard if it was a helicopter and it was too high for a helicopter.  there were airplanes in the sky but very far off in the distance.  we also could see stars in the distance, so it wasn't cloudy. it disappeared in front of our eyes going straight up.  all of us were shocked by what we saw and knew it was nothing we could explain logically.  we were all in agreement that it was a ufo.

my husband was grabbing for his iphone but it disappeared before he could get the camera function on.  it would have been an unbelievable thing to get on camera!!!
content.summary: Big bright light shining down - disappeared almost instantly

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home and i looked up at jupiter as i often do on a perfectly clear night.  i noticed a bright, white light in the south sky just ahead of us. it was so bright, much brighter and larger than jupiter and originally we thought it was helicopter, then we realized that there was no way - it was too high and way too bright.  it looked as if the light was a large bright flashlight shining down through a hazy lit fog. neither of us knew what to think or had any idea what it was. it was projecting down and the bright light suddenly went dark but the hazy foggy cloud that was present below the light continued to glow for several seconds after the light went out. in a few seconds, the sky was again perfectly clear.  there were no clouds in the sky and the entire event only lasted about 30 seconds.  i immediately came home and started looking to see if anyone else had seen what we saw - it seems like the entire northeast witnessed this event.
content.summary: Bright star with hazy cloud in a cone below

content.detailedDescription: Large very bright white circle with cone ,circle lasted 1 minute, cone 3 minutes. in southern vermont, 4 witnesses
content.summary: Large very bright white circle with cone, circle lasted 1 minute, cone 3 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 7:50 pm eastern time on 19 september, i was sitting in my car in a parking lot in vienna, virginia.  i looked out the driver side window, to the southeast toward merrifield or annandale, and noticed an unusual light source.  at first, i thought it was a star or planet, then realized it was closer and larger, and most importantly, it appeared to be casting a triangular beam of light downward like a flashlight in the fog.  i then thought it might be a helicopter, as fairfax county police and military often fly in this area, but then realized that the light source was not moving.  the source and it's beam remained for about thirty seconds, then the source shrunk (not faded, or moved off) until it was no longer visible.  however the triangular "beam" remained for about thirty seconds to a minute until it diminished.

i immediately phoned my wife and relayed the incident.  when i returned home i searched the web for some place to report the sighting.  i ended up at mufon (a site and organization that i have had no knowledge of previously) and began reading reports that match mine exactly, at almost the exact same time, from virginia to maine.

i am an aerospace engineer with alot of experience.  i cannot explain what i and many others saw tonight.
content.summary: Light source casting downward triangle beam

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a fishing trip on ellsworth lake. i came north on marion center rd in marion twp. i turned east onto ferry rd coming onto loeb rd. i then again turned north to head out to m-66. as i got near m-66 i noticed these 5 very brightly colored lights in the shape of a backwards #7. i lost them for a minute or two behind the treeline. i turned south onto m-66 when i saw them again almost directly over the highway. i began to notice other motorists pulled over and some were out of their cars watching this event. i looked up again and the lights moved into a v-like formation. and then back out into the previous formation. they didn't look very high up at all. i pulled over to see if maybe it was a group of helicopters or planes. i then got out of my truck and looked up in that direction again and they vanished. i stood there in utter disbelief and i watched the other people get back in their vehicles and leave. i came home told my wife what i saw and now i am contacting you. i have never seen anything like that ever. i just wanted to share my story. it happened just minutes ago and i am trying to get it all down the way i saw it. the time was 9;10 pm. it lasted about 7 minutes.
content.summary: Sighted 5 lights in abackward 7 shape changing into an almost v shape and fading out to nothing

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my porch looking into the sky as i usually do when i noticed a bright star with a cone shaped light illuminating the sky.  the foreign object, located in the southern sky, approximately 7-8" inches south east of another star was relatively motionless.  the duration of the sighting lasted maybe 10 seconds, although it may have been in the sky longer without my knowledge.  as i began to examine the object closely with my naked eye, the cone shaped light beneath the star began to fade away.  almost simultaneously the bright star attached above it also disappeared.  it seemed very peculiar how the object disappeared, given the fact that the sky was clear of any clouds.  this is unlike anything i have ever seen before.  at the time of the sighting, i felt a sense of composed excitement.  a part of me felt honoured to have experienced the sighting, while another part of me felt the urge to share the expereince with others. 
sooo, what was this?  
thanks
content.summary: Bright cone shaped light from star shining towards earth

content.detailedDescription:
My bird and i were getting some sun when she became fixated on something.  thinking it was a hawk i looked and she was starring at an extremely bright white light in the sky, just about 2 o'clock from straight up.  my first thought was that it was a planet.  but, it was much brighter and larger than i have seen.  i asked my husband to get the binoculars to take a better look. in the 2-3 minutes it took him the light started to very slowly move away like it was going down south but not seeming to change how high-up it was. when we looked at it with the binoculars it was just a bright pure white light, no outline or other colors. if i had to give it a shape it would be round, like the light of a flashlight, but i could not call it a sphere. 
in the past we have seen metallic balloons, the bird hates them, and they move bouncy with the air and tend to flicker with the light reflection, so i am pretty sure it was not a balloon.
we took turns looking with the binoculars and watched it for approx 10-15 minutes before it became to small to see.
no matter what it was it was a unique experience.
content.summary: Bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach down the street of my house with my parents and my cousin we were going fishing and we were eating smores. i was sitting near the fire eating smores when we were admiring the stars all of a sudden we looked around and my cousin and i both said look at that it was a extreamly bright light facing toward the the right where we were sitting. so i yelled over to tell my mom across the street and she saw it too. then we noticed it got bigger and bigger i couldnt believe it. it was the biggest thing i had ever seen and it looked like a huge church bell shape. we were starring at it for about 30 secconds and then it startted to disolve in a way and about 2 minutes later it was totally gone. we were talking about for 20 minutes after that saying nobody will believe us then we called my nana and she couldnt believe it either. then we were getting ready to go back home around 8 a truck drove by and stopped in the place where you park they were 3 fisherman and we were saying hello and being friendly then one of the 3 men said did you see that light about 30 minutes ago? we of course said yes knowing we werent the only ones who saw it we were happy. it ended up they were our neighbors and they saw it while they were fishing over the newport bridge and they came back because they noticed it was closer to our house they were happy we had saw it also.  we were too but we know we not the only witnesses. that is my story on my ufo sightin.
content.summary: A small bright light turned into a huge light that was bell shaped and then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:45 p.M. eastern time i was alone in my backyard. there were no clouds; the sky was completely clear. i saw a light appear in the south. it was joined by a cone of light below it, the whole effect looking like a spotlight from a helicopter or a flashlight pointing down from above, shining through fog or smoke. the bright light lasted 10-15 seconds, finally flickering out and leaving just the cloud, which faded quickly. i went inside to get my wife and she noticed i was shaken up.
content.summary: Bright white/blue light like a spotlight illuminating a cone-shaped cloud

content.detailedDescription: A bright light appeared in sky to the s/se. it was a flooding light that pointed like a flash light down towards ground. it suddenly vanished leaving a almost smoky after affect. there were about 6 witnesses standing around a bonfire at the time.
content.summary: Bright light w/cone

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing about 2 miles from woods hole at trunk river just after dark. there is no moon and the stars are coming out. the first and brightest star is over marthas vineyard. at about 7:45pm, [cms/tg/pd] my eye catches what i first thought was a very bright shooting star with a cone-shaped tail, like a flashlight beam. it was to my right in the sky between the nobska lighthouse and the vineyard. 
i couldn't tell if what i was looking at was real or just my eyes adjusting in the darkness. hadn't i just been starring at that bright star over the vineyard? the cone started to look like smoke being blow in the dark and grew larger. it grew to the size of a large cloud. at that moment i was relieved as i realized what i'd seen was just a strange cloud. the cloud started to slowly move east. as i reassured myself everything was normal, the cloud quickly broke apart and disolved. very unusual. still not sure if i wasn't the lights playing tricks on my eyes.
content.summary: Was somone blowing smoke in the sky?

content.detailedDescription: My wife was outside on the phone when she started yelling for me to come to her. i came outside and in front of us facing north, a column of light with mist in it and within 10sec it was gone like there was nothing there. she said a triangular appeared and began to become extremely bright then suddenly began to emit a light,almost like a flood light straight down with like a mist engulfed in it. by then time i saw it,it was just a tall column of extremely bright light. it looked like a comet tail coming from the ground,but no noise.I've read 4 reports just from tonight around the same time from ma,ri and two from ct describing the same thing. what's going on here?
content.summary: Clear night triangular shape appeared, progressively got brighter, trail of light and mist emitted from bottom into a cone shape.

content.detailedDescription: A stationary beam of light creating a comet-like tail on a clear starry night, lasting about ten seconds, extinguishing, but the glow remained for about 4 more minutes
content.summary: A stationary beam of light creating a comet-like tail on a clear starry night, lasting about ten seconds, extinguishing, but the glow remained for about 4 more minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a bright light in the sky that made the shape of a cone underneath it.  it was similar to a upside down ice cream cone with a lght on top.  it was a white light.  there were no colors.  the bright light at the top of the cone faded leaving the cone itself.  then the cone faded as well.  the object was stationary.
about 45 minutes later i saw a bright light that blinked slowely at an irregular pace moving north to south across the sky.  it did not appear to be a plane because the light was very bright and blinked slowely - about three times  - then it disappeared. this light was also white - no colors.
content.summary: I saw a cone shaped light due south of my location.

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbor and i, and his son saw in the southeastern sky, near the brightest star, was what appeared to be a star with a spotlight shining from it in a v shape.  then it appeared as it was getting foggy and it got dimmer until it disappeared.  we only got to see it for a few seconds.  i was reaching for my camera phone, but it was gone before i could get it out.
it was stationary in the sky.  it looked just like a star, that switched on a spotlight and then the whole thing just faded away.
content.summary: Star with spotlight

content.detailedDescription:
my two month old son was going to his grams for the night so i decided to sit on my front porch with him and wait for her.  on my way out the door my three year old daughter asked where we were going and i explained we were just going to sit on the step and wait for their gram to pick up her brother for the night.  she wanted to come with rather than stay inside with my mother.

  i proceded out the door with my son in my arms and my daughter following behind.  she neglected to shut the door so i turned back and grabbed it.  i then made my way to our single step to our porch and sat down.  my daughter was still behind me as i fussed with my son's hoodie.  as my daughter came up beside me to my right i happened to look directly up in the sky.  right above the tree in my next door neighbors yard was a star and to the left of the star was the object.

  the object looked like another star but it had a light coming down from it that reminded me of that of a flashlight.  i looked at it for a moment in shock, blurted out a few choice words, and hurried up and back into the house to get my mother before it disappeared.  my very confused daughter ran behind me.  my mother was sitting on the couch eating a plate of spagetti as i yelled at her to hurry up and come outside to look at the object before it disappeared.

  we hurried back outside and the object was fading away.  my mother is colorblind and can't see sligt differences in shades so she could not see the object's light.  within a matter of moments the object was completely gone.  strangely enough, at the same time a flock of geese could be heard freaking out but stopped when the object vanished.  i believe that the commotion made my the geese was connected with the appearance and disappearance of the object.

  i remained outside with my son, daughter, and mother after the incident.  i was still freaking out about the incident when my mother-in-law arrived.  i'm not sure if she believed me.  my mother-in-law shortly left with my son for the night and my daughter went back to the house with my father.  my mother remained outside with me looking up at the night sky.  the object did not return.
content.summary: Star-like object with flashlight-like beam

content.detailedDescription: Very large bright white light was shining and below it was a cone shaped fog which remained illuminated in the sky after the white light vanished.  we saw the white light with the cone shape illumination under it for about 3 to 4 mins. the fog remained for another couple of mins then simply vanished.  i've never seen anything like this before.  it almost looked like a street light in the sky.  i kept looking at the stars in the sky which seemed so dim next to this bright light which didn't move, just disappeared, leaving the fog illuminated.  i've seen airplanes in the sky before, this was much, much larger with no blinking lights.  my boyfriend and i were just getting into our hot tub, which is in our back yard.  i started looking at the stars in the night sky. when i first looked at it, i could not figure out what it was.  i've never seen anything like it.  no motion. it just hung in the sky for a few mins and i noticed the illuminated fog under it.  my boyfriend was trying to talk to me and i didn't answer so he looked up and saw this as well.  we do not know what to make of it.  wish we had our camera.
content.summary: Very large bright white light was shining and below it was a cone shaped fog which remained illuminated in the sky after the white light vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
On sept. 19, 2009 about 8pm we spotted a ufo in the south western sky. we are located on the long island sound in rock point new york.
the night sky was completely clear, you could see stars all around. there were absolutely no clouds and no moon either.
the ufo was shaped like a gum drop with a bright bluish white light beaming  out of the bottom of it. it hovered, making no sound whatsoever for about 10 seconds.  the ufo then moved upward quickly into a fog like mist; while at the same time, the bright beam of light disappeared as if closed like a clam shell.
content.summary: Ufo sighting long island sound in rock point new york

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach down the street of my house with my parents and my cousin we were going fishing and we were eating smores. i was sitting near the fire eating smores when we were admiring the stars all of a sudden we looked around and my cousin and i both said look at that it was a extreamly bright light facing toward the the right where we were sitting. so i yelled over to tell my mom across the street and she saw it too. then we noticed it got bigger and bigger i couldnt believe it. it was the biggest thing i had ever seen and it looked like a huge church bell shape. we were starring at it for about 30 secconds and then it startted to disolve in a way and about 2 minutes later it was totally gone. we were talking about for 20 minutes after that saying nobody will believe us then we called my nana and she couldnt believe it either. then we were getting ready to go back home around 8 a truck drove by and stopped in the place where you park they were 3 fisherman and we were saying hello and being friendly then one of the 3 men said did you see that light about 30 minutes ago? we of course said yes knowing we werent the only ones who saw it we were happy. it ended up they were our neighbors and they saw it while they were fishing over the newport bridge and they came back because they noticed it was closer to our house they were happy we had saw it also.  we were too but we know we not the only witnesses. that is my story on my ufo sightin.
content.summary: A small bright light turned into a huge light that was bell shaped and then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: My five year old and i were outside looking at stars and we saw a very bright light, too close to be star. it was a gigantic, very bright light with a cone shining down. as if someone was shining a gigantic flashlight down thru the clouds, except it wasn't cloudy. it was way too big to be a plane and it was moving slowly upward. it was far away from us. we viewed it for about a minute. the light went out and the cone slowly faded away. the most amazing thing i have ever seen. my son remarked, "the lights went out and god got a flashlight".
content.summary: It looked like someone was shining a flashlight down on earth.

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing basketball outside when i saw what looked like a very bright stationary star, to the south,  with a searchlight on it. it was in between two trees.  it appeared to be at the same altitude as a helicopter would be at, but it was soundless. the beam then began to stretch toward the ground in a type of glowing fog or mist. the fog gave off a radioactive white glow. the stationary object disappeared with out a trace, but the fog or mist remained for another 5-10 seconds. the fog then faded out.  at first i thought it could be some sort of chemical weapon, but then i relized i had seen somthing truely amazing.   
g.A.K.
content.summary: A bright light shined from the sky from a  stationary object leaving a luminous cloud.
